coreAttributes.name: witch's broom
coreAttributes.description: An old-fashioned wooden broom, consisting of a long pole with a bundle of flexible twigs attached to one end. The opposite end of the pole widens out a little, where there's a curious engraving of a pentagram etched into the wood.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Harnessing the power of the arcane, [npc.name] [npc.verb(materialise)] a bolt of arcane energy around [npc.her] broom, before shooting it to strike [npc2.name]!
Pointing [npc.her] broom at [npc2.name], a bolt of arcane energy materialises before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name]!
As [npc.name] [npc.verb(raise)] [npc.his] broom, a bolt of arcane energy materialises itself before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Harnessing the power of the arcane, [npc.name] [npc.verb(materialise)] a bolt of arcane energy around [npc.her] broom, before shooting it to strike [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!

Pointing [npc.her] broom at [npc2.name], a bolt of arcane energy materialises before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
As [npc.name] [npc.verb(raise)] [npc.his] broom, a bolt of arcane energy materialises itself before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name], but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
